attributes.action: Make is compulsory to fly the Union flag and home nation flag at every public building.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to TAKE BACK the flags of our nation for the people, to ensure that the racists and biggots do not control our flags.  We therefore need to show pride in our nation and one way to do that is to fly our flags from every council office, school, library etc etc

rejection.details:
UK Government departments have the freedom to fly the Union Flag on their buildings, and many now do so all the time:
http://www.culture.gov.uk/flagflying/gbcr.html
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
